name: SA5

name: SA17

name: Ir60a-SA18
notes: �Ir60a-Gal4 displays extensive and variable non-neuronal expression, which is likely to be non-specific; as Ir60a is located within the intron of another gene (nord), this may reflect overlapping regulatory elements of these genes.�
